title: The Way of a Man with a Maid
description: This is the depraved story of Jack. Jack lures women into a room he calls 'The Snuggery. 'The Snuggery' is an erotic torture chamber. In this soundproof room, the helpless women are strapped to beds ... "The Way of a Man with a Maid" is a sadomasochistic, pornographic classic, famous for being both funny and sexy. It was probably first published in 1908. The author remains anonymous to this day.
author: Anonymous
